--- create_table_types.sql
create table types (
  b bool,
  i int64,
  f32 float32,
  f float64,
  d date,
  t timestamp,
  s string(256),
  smax string(max),
  bs bytes(256),
  bsmax bytes(max),
  ab array<bool>,
  abs array<bytes(max)>,
  p examples.ProtoType,
) primary key (i)

--- AST

  Create:      0,
  Rparen:      252,
  IfNotExists: false,
  Name:        &ast.Path{
    Idents: []*ast.Ident{

        NamePos: 13,
        NameEnd: 18,
        Name:    "types",
      },

--- SQL
CREATE TABLE types (b BOOL, i INT64, f32 FLOAT32, f FLOAT64, d DATE, t TIMESTAMP, s STRING(256), smax STRING(MAX), bs BYTES(256), bsmax BYTES(MAX), ab ARRAY<BOOL>, abs ARRAY<BYTES(MAX)>, p examples.ProtoType) PRIMARY KEY (i)
